subject: Rajasthan History
question_hi: जोधपुर के राजधानी के राजधानी क्या थे?
explanation_en: Bhojpal Rao Jodha was the founder of Jodhpur and ruled over the Meera Kingdom. He is popularly known as the 'Builder of Jodhpur'.
explanation_hi: बोजपाल राव जोध जोधपुर के बनाने वाला थे और मेरी कंगांवाले थे। वो विभागीय जन्म और त्रींगीय स्मरांवाले थे।
question_en: Who built Jodhpur and ruled over the Meera Kingdom?
explanation_en: Rao Jodha was the founder of Jodhpur and ruled over the Meera Kingdom.
explanation_hi: राव जोध जोधपुर के बनावाले थें और मेरी कंगांवाले थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which historical event took place during the reign of Maharaja Man Singh I?
question_hi: महाराज माहाराज एको पाठमी के बाजराजर में के राज के समय में की एक अवसर हुई थी।
